Description: Takes all characters of a string and replaces them with 'X'
Replaces all but then first and last characters with 'X'
RuleCode: NULLIF(CASE WHEN LEN({FieldName}) <= 2 THEN REPLICATE('X',LEN({FieldName})) ELSE CONCAT(LEFT({FieldName}, 1),REPLICATE('X', LEN({FieldName})- 2),RIGHT({FieldName},1)) END,'')
